name: The Sims 2
description:
This installer uses D9VK.
It is made for the Ultimate Collection version from Origin.
notes: IMPORTANT: READ THE MANUAL AND INSTALL DEPENDENCIES! See https://github.com/lutris/lutris/wiki/Game:-The-Sims-2 - The game will fail to launch with Origin-In-Game enabled. Please disable it in Origin's preferences to launch The Sims 2. - For support, contact @Tannis Root on Lutris Discord server.

task.app: nocrashdialog arial vcrun2010 vcrun2013 win7 d3dcompiler_43 d3dcompiler_47 d3dx9
task.name: winetricks

task.description: Installing Origin... Login window will pop-up and close.
task.name: wineexec

content:
files:
- client: https://download.dm.origin.com/origin/live/OriginThinSetup.exe
game:
  arch: win64
  exe: drive_c/Program Files (x86)/Origin/Origin.exe
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
installer:
- task:
    arch: win64
    description: Creating Wine prefix
    name: create_prefix
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- execute:
    command: mkdir "$GAMEDIR/nv-shaders"
- write_file:
    content: dxgi.nvapiHack = False
    file: $GAMEDIR/dxvk.conf
- task:
    app: nocrashdialog arial vcrun2010 vcrun2013 win7 d3dcompiler_43 d3dcompiler_47
      d3dx9
    arch: win64
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- write_file:
    content: boolprop useshaders true
    file: "$GAMEDIR/drive_c/users/$USER/My Documents/EA Games/The Sims\u2122 2 Ultimate\
      \ Collection/Config/userstartup.cheat"
- task:
    name: winekill
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    arch: win64
    args: /silent
    description: Installing Origin... Login window will pop-up and close.
    exclude_processes: Origin.exe OriginClientService.exe OriginWebHelperService.exe
      QtWebEngineProcess.exe
    executable: client
    name: wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    name: winekill
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
system:
  env:
    DXVK_CONFIG_FILE: $GAMEDIR/dxvk.conf
    DXVK_HUD: 0
    WINE_LARGE_ADDRESS_AWARE: 1
    __GL_SHADER_DISK_CACHE: 1
    __GL_SHADER_DISK_CACHE_PATH: $GAMEDIR/nv-shaders
  exclude_processes: QtWebEngineProcess.exe ActivationUI.exe OriginWebHelperService.exe
wine:
  dxvk: true
  overrides:
    nvapi,nvapi64: disabled
